item.description:
IBD Method Group

Please RSVP!

We will be having our second Newbie Pre-Meeting class this month. It will focus on CANSLIM basics. If you are new to the CANSLIM Method, come at 6. If you are more advanced and want to skip the basics, come at 7.


This month's agenda:
  • CANSLIM Basics for Newbies - Chris - 6-7pm - This month, we will be reviewing/discussing the first 6 chapters of O'Neil's 24 Lessons book that we handed out at last meeting (be sure to bring your book). Please read these chapters before the meeting! We will also watch and discuss the IBD TV Stock of the Day.

  • 7:00 - 7:15 - Intro to main meeting - Jeff
  • 7:15 - 7:30 - IBD Market Report - Keith
  • 7:30 - 8:00 - IBD 100 Stocks - Are they ready? - Steve Steve Weiser will look at the technicals of several IBD 100 stocks and discuss their "readiness" with the group.
  • 8:00 - 8:30 - Stock Screen - Peter
  • 8:30 - 9:30 - Mike's Daily Routine - Mike Kinkead Mike has a routine that he goes through to find and track IBD stocks every morning. He will walk us through his routine and will "think out loud" for us. If you are looking to improve your own daily routine, this will help.
  • 9:30 - 10:00 - Stock Picks - Jeff



Who We Are

This IBD Method is for people who are currently learning and applying IBD tools and the CANSLIM Method to their investing.

Only those seeking to learn the IBD CANSLIM Method should attend.




  • We have our own Google Group - IBDLevels. This is a moderated discussion that is also an IBD centric Google Group and its home page says as much. Join it via this link: http://groups.google....

group.name: Boston Investor's Business Daily Meetup Group

item.name: IBD Method Group - with Newbie Pre-Meeting Class
